fields.descriptive_line:
[Panel] Gilt leather panel, with a pattern of a diaper of flowers in red and green with green and gilded leaves on a silver ground. The leaves are arranged so as to form parallel lines crossing one another and enclosing the flowers. The side-border, decorated with a green cable and small red flowers, is part of the panel, Italy, ca. 1500-1600.

[Panel] Gilt leather panel, with a pattern of a diaper of flowers in red and green with green and gilded leaves on a silver ground, Italy, ca. 1500-1600.

[Panel] Gilt leather panel, with a pattern of a diaper of flowers in red and green with green and gilded leaves on a silver ground, Italy, ca. 1500-1600.
[Leather panel] Gilt leather panel, with a pattern of a diaper of flowers in red and green with green and gilded leaves on a silver ground, Italy, ca. 1500-1600.
[Leather panel] Gilt leather border, decorated with two bands, the upper having sprays of red, green, dark-green and gilded flowers on a silvered ground, and the lower a stamped diaper design with tassels, Italy, ca. 1500-1600.

[Leather panel] Gilt leather border, decorated with two bands, the upper having sprays of red, green, dark-green and gilded flowers on a silvered ground, and the lower a stamped diaper design with tassels, Italy, ca. 1500-1600.
fields.physical_description:
[Panel] Gilt leather panel, with a pattern of a diaper of flowers in red and green with green and gilded leaves on a silver ground. The leaves are arranged so as to form parallel lines crossing one another and enclosing the flowers. The side-border, decorated with a green cable and small red flowers, is part of the panel. The silvered and gilded parts have been punched with various small stamps. This panel was part of a large hanging, described originally as: 'Leather hanging consisting of four panels, with two borders at the top. The pattern consists of a diaper of flowers in red and green, with green and gold leaves, on a silver ground. The leaves are arranged so as to form parallel lines crossing one another and enclosing the flowers. The borders at the sides are ornamented with interlacing black lines with rosettes in red on a gold ground. The border at the top is made up of two bands, the upper having sprays of flowers in red, green, and gold, on a silver ground, and the lower a stamped diaper design. The whole panel is further decorated with small stamped diapers.'
[Panel] Gilt leather panel, with a pattern of a diaper of flowers in red and green with green and gilded leaves on a silver ground. The leaves are arranged so as to form parallel lines crossing one another and enclosing the flowers. The side-border, decorated with a green cable and small red flowers, is part of the panel. The silvered and gilded parts have been punched with various small stamps. This panel was part of a large hanging, described originally as:
'Leather hanging consisting of four panels, with two borders at the top. The pattern consists of a diaper of flowers in red and green, with green and gold leaves, on a silver ground. The leaves are arranged so as to form parallel lines crossing one another and enclosing the flowers. The borders at the sides are ornamented with interlacing black lines with rosettes in red on a gold ground. The border at the top is made up of two bands, the upper having sprays of flowers in red, green, and gold, on a silver ground, and the lower a stamped diaper design. The whole panel is further decorated with small stamped diapers.'

The silvered and gilded parts have been punched with various small stamps. This panel was part of a large hanging, described originally as:
'Leather hanging consisting of four panels, with two borders at the top. The pattern consists of a diaper of flowers in red and green, with green and gold leaves, on a silver ground. The leaves are arranged so as to form parallel lines crossing one another and enclosing the flowers. The border at the top is made up of two bands, the upper having sprays of flowers in red, green, and gold, on a silver ground, and the lower a stamped diaper design. The whole panel is further decorated with small stamped diapers.'

The leaves are arranged so as to form parallel lines crossing one another and enclosing the flowers. The side-border, decorated with a green cable and small red flowers, is part of the panel. The silvered and gilded parts have been punched with various small stamps. This panel was part of a large hanging, described originally as: 'Leather hanging consisting of four panels, with two borders at the top. The pattern consists of a diaper of flowers in red and green, with green and gold leaves, on a silver ground. The leaves are arranged so as to form parallel lines crossing one another and enclosing the flowers. The borders at the sides are ornamented with interlacing black lines with rosettes in red on a gold ground. The border at the top is made up of two bands, the upper having sprays of flowers in red, green, and gold, on a silver ground, and the lower a stamped diaper design. The whole panel is further decorated with small stamped diapers.'
[Leather panel] Gilt leather border, decorated with two bands, the upper having sprays of red, green, dark-green and gilded flowers on a silvered ground, and the lower a stamped diaper design with tassels. This border was part of a large hanging, described originally as: 'Leather hanging consisting of four panels, with two borders at the top. The pattern consists of a diaper of flowers in red and green, with green and gold leaves, on a silver ground. The leaves are arranged so as to form parallel lines crossing one another and enclosing the flowers. The borders at the sides are ornamented with interlacing black lines with rosettes in red on a gold ground. The border at the top is made up of two bands, the upper having sprays of flowers in red, green, and gold, on a silver ground, and the lower a stamped diaper design. The whole panel is further decorated with small stamped diapers.'

[Leather panel] Gilt leather border, decorated with two bands, the upper having sprays of red, green, dark-green and gilded flowers on a silvered ground, and the lower a stamped diaper design with tassels. This border was part of a large hanging, described originally as: 'Leather hanging consisting of four panels, with two borders at the top. The pattern consists of a diaper of flowers in red and green, with green and gold leaves, on a silver ground. The leaves are arranged so as to form parallel lines crossing one another and enclosing the flowers. The borders at the sides are ornamented with interlacing black lines with rosettes in red on a gold ground. The border at the top is made up of two bands, the upper having sprays of flowers in red, green, and gold, on a silver ground, and the lower a stamped diaper design. The whole panel is further decorated with small stamped diapers.'

fields.history_note:
[Panel] Formerly described as 'Florentine, 16th century'. There is, however, no exact information available (not in Italy or elsewhere) to keep this attribution any longer standing. The whole group of  panels and hangings that were acquired from Bardini were, without any exception, being described in this way, although for instance inventory number 732-1890 has proven to be of a Dutch origin. A photo of this hanging, dd. circa 1885-1890, exists in Museo Bardini, Florence. This panel has been analysed as part of the gilt leather cataloguing project in 1996. Information supplied by Eloy Koldeweij, October 1996.
